body.name: JPMA & Greenguard Gold Certified Grace 5 in 1 Convertible Crib Made with Sustainable New Zealand Pinewood in White, Non-Toxic Finish
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 39 mins
features: 5 IN 1 CONVERTIBILITY: Modern and long-lasting, this crib effortlessly converts from a standard-size crib to a toddler bed, daybed & full-size bed (conversion kit sold separately).
THE SAFE CHOICE: The Grace 5 in 1 Convertible Crib is not only JPMA and Greenguard Gold Certified, but also meets/exceed the ASTM & CPSC standards.
DURABLE BUILD: Constructed out of sustainable New Zealand Pinewood with a non-toxic finish, this must-have crib is sturdy and durable.
VERSATILE FINISH: This wonderful crib comes in 2 graceful finishes - Pebble Grey & White, that perfectly blend in, no matter the decor of your baby’s nursery
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Product dimensions are 54.5" L X 29.5" W X 49" H and weight is 44 Lbs
body.description: A safe space for your baby to sleep, lounge and grow! Introducing the Grace 5 in 1 Convertible Crib from Dream On Me - a timeless addition to your nursery setup. Modern and long-lasting, this crib effortlessly converts from a standard-size crib to a toddler bed, daybed & full-size bed (conversion kit sold separately). Keeping the safety of your child in mind, the Grace 5 in 1 Convertible Crib is not only JPMA & Greenguard Gold certified, but also meets/exceeds the ASTM & CPSC standards. Constructed out of sustainable New Zealand Pinewood with a non-toxic finish, this must-have crib is sturdy & durable. The thoughtfully designed Grace 5 in 1 Convertible Crib is also easy to maintain - simply spot or wipe clean. What’s more, this wonderful crib comes in 2 graceful finishes - Pebble Grey & White, that perfectly blend in, no matter the decor of your baby’s nursery. Product dimensions are 54.5" L X 29.5" W X 49" H with a weight of 44 Lbs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dream On Me Twilight 5” 88 Coil Inner Spring Crib And Toddler Mattress Dream On Me Nest Portable Play Yard Dream On Me Classic Design Toddler Bed Dream On Me Convertible Crib Toddler Guard Rail Dream On Me Universal Bed Rail Product Description Your baby will curl-up in comfort on the Twilight Spring Coil Mattress by Dream On Me. Constructed with quality materials and workmanship this mattress is manufactured with pride in the USA. A full-size playard, the Nest is spacious, safe and loaded with convenient features. The Dream On Me Classic Design Toddler Bed is ideal for toddlers as they make the transition from a crib to a bed. The crib guard rail is designed to fit your toddler's bed perfectly, ensuring their safety during sleep. The convertible full size bed rail accommodates growing children and asily attachable to a full size crib Certifications Greenguard Gold & JPMA Certified Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC Greenguard Gold, JPMA certified & meets and exceeds the CPSC & ASTM standards Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Save yourself the aggravation. The wood is cheap and plastic like, they don’t send you the correct screws & my crib came in with chipped paint and scratches. Tried customer service just to be told to return the crib .. well a little too late for that when I’ve already dealt with the hassle of putting the darn thing up and my baby is due any time now, just gunna have to fix all the issues myself but so not worth the money and annoyance. Complete BS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made crib
reviews.reviewText: This 5-in-1 convertible crib is well made and beautifully designed. I love that it grows with my child so I don't have to buy a new bed every few years since babies grow quickly. I really like this cribs adjustable mattress support base has two different height options so I can choose the right one for my childs age. The newborn height option is wonderful when your baby is just born because bending way down is not easy after just having a baby so this option helps provide easier access to get your infant in and out of the crib. This crib is easy to assemble. The instructions are clear and simple to follow. All the pieces go together properly without any issues. This is a beautiful well made crib that is well made and durable. I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for something that will last and grow with your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item had several cracks and chipped paint
reviews.reviewText: The box arrived damaged and there were a few pieces that were cracked and missing paint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, it’s not white. It’s silver. Second, it came with nothing to assemble. No directions. Nothing!! It’s so heavy and now I have to try and figure out a way to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Any Gender
reviews.reviewText: Your going to need a flat head screw driver.The bed has some gabs in the head board so you can see some screws but it's not a major flaw.Assembly was easy for my husband he got confused a few times but he did it. Very sturdy because my 2 year old already jumped on it when we were making the bed. A toddler mattress from Walmart fit inside we had one from my sons old bed. This bed offers style as well as affordable when it comes to being a 3 and 1. This is not just a crib it's your child's growth and something you can cherish ad they grow. You get that packet to store your instructions in it to be able to change the bed later. You also get the papers to register it to you in case of a recall. I would call this bed and color any gender its flawless sleek and different from. Your basic crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This crib is absolutely gorgeous. I bought it for my child who is already 17mo. She fits in it so much better than her mini crib! It went together perfectly. We didn't have any issues with it. The instructions sit on the topside of the mattress frame/under the mattress which I thought was very convenient! The back board seems a little on the thin side, I'm not sure how long that will last. The four stars is because one of our boards had a decent sized dent in it straight out of the box.
